text: (Lo! those who distort Our revelations) those who deny Our signs-Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an-(are not hid from Us) none of their works is hidden from Us. (Is he who is hurled into the Fire) Abu Jahl and his host (better, or he who cometh secure) from the torment (on the Day of Resurrection) this refers to Muhammad (pbuh) and his Companions? (Do what ye will) O people of Mecca; this is a threat made to them. (Lo! He is Seer of what ye do) He will requite your works.
